testcase.name: I should be able to login successfully to SauceDemo using valid credentials
testcase.system-out: Given I login to SauceDemo using valid credentials..........................passed Then I should be navigated to dashboard page................................passed

testcase.name: User should be able to see an error message in SauceDemo login page when I used invalid credentials
testcase.system-out: Given I login to SauceDemo using invalid credentials........................passed Then I should be able to see an error message...............................passed

testcase.name: User should be able to see an error message in SauceDemo login page when username and password fields are empty
testcase.system-out: Given I login to SauceDemo using empty credentials..........................passed Then I should be able to see the error message : "Epic sadface: Username is required".passed

testcase.name: User should be able to see an error message in SauceDemo login page when password field is empty
testcase.system-out: Given I login to SauceDemo using empty password field.......................passed Then I should be able to see the error message : "Epic sadface: Password is required".passed
